title: This is Why You Should Never Give Up in Ranked
body:
5 failed surrender attempts, multiple (almost) aces, and being down absurd amounts of gold... and I didn't give up. THIS IS WHY YOU NEVER GIVE UP IN RANKED! >:{D



http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/1998298483/41909791?tab=overview
Just look at the chart, and then *believe*
